title: npm-run-mcp-server config
description: Controls which package.json scripts are exposed as MCP tools, plus optional per-script metadata.

include.description: Exact script names to include. If omitted, all scripts are eligible (subject to exclude).

toolName.description: Override the generated tool name (after sanitization).

argsDescription.description: Description shown for the `args` input field.

inputSchema.description: JSON Schema for additional tool inputs; keys are converted to CLI flags. `args` is always available.
